name: absorb
description: user recovers half the hp inflicted on the opponent.

name: dig
description: digs underground on first turn, attacks on second.

name: disable
description: opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

name: dream eater
description: user recovers half the hp inflicted on the opponent.

name: earthquake
description: power doubled if opponent underground from using dig.

name: fissure
description: one hit ko if it hits.

name: fly
description: flies up on first turn, attacks on second.

name: growth
description: raises user's attack and special attack.

name: guillotine
description: one hit ko if it hits.

name: gust
description: hits pokemon using fly with 2x power.

name: high jump kick
description: if it misses, the user loses half their hp.

name: horn drill
description: one hit ko if it hits.

name: jump kick
description: if it misses, the user loses half their hp.

name: leech life
description: user recovers half the hp inflicted on the opponent.

name: leech seed
description: user steals hp from the opponent each turn.

name: light screen
description: halves damage from special attacks for 5 turns.

name: meditate
description: raises user's attack and special attack.

name: mega drain
description: user recovers half the hp inflicted on the opponent.

name: metronome
description: user performs any attack in the game at random.

name: mist
description: user's stats cannot be changes for a period of time.

name: night shade
description: inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: pay day
description: a small amount of money is gained after the battle ends.

name: razor wind
description: charges  on first turn, attacks on second.

name: recover
description: user recovers half its maximum hp.

name: reflect
description: halves damage from physical attacks for five turns.

name: rest
description: user sleeps for 2 turns, but regains full health.

name: roar
description: opponent switches. in wild, battle ends.

name: seismic toss
description: inflicts damage equal to user level.

name: sky attack
description: charges on first turn, attacks on second.

name: soft-boiled
description: user recovers half its max hp.

name: solar beam
description: charges on first turn, attacks on second.

name: struggle
description: only useable when all pp are gone. hurts user.

name: substitute
description: uses hp to create a decoy that takes hits.

name: super fang
description: takes off half the opponent's hp.

name: transform
description: user copies form and attacks of opponent.

name: tri attack
description: may paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

name: twineedle
description: hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

name: whirlwind
description: opponent switches. in wild, battle ends.
